            Public communication about vaccination and health
            How do online media report about alternative medicine? I
            led a content analysis study as part of the Reason4Health
            project. Read the
            paper. Generate
            random news stories!
            How do online media report about vaccination rates? Read the paper
            stemming from my PhD project.
            How should public messaging leverage vaccination rates?
            Is better to emphasize individual or social benefits of
            vaccination? Read the
            preprint and the paper also
            stemming from my PhD project.
            Why should we use stories to counter anti-vaccination
            conspiracy theories? Read our
            paper.
            What photos should ‚Äì and shouldn‚Äôt ‚Äì be used in public
            communication about vaccination? I wrote a blogpost
            about this, with links to 150 examples of good photos that
            are open and free to use.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Laziƒá

            About me
            I am a PhD Researcher at the University of Belgrade (LIRA Lab).
            My current research explores how social context
            influences our health decisions and its implications for
            policy and public communication (e.g.¬†in the media). Find
            more in #HealthComm.
            I am also interested in how people decide to help others
            and contribute to the public good. Find more in #SocialDilemmas.
            I am actively engaged in promoting open research data
            sharing as well as improving the inclusivity and
            accessibility of open science. Find more in #OpenScience.
            If you want to get on my good side, ask me about my next
            half-marathon.üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄ
            For a full list of my publications and outreach
            activities, please see my CV.
            
            
            Public communication about vaccination and health
            How do online media report about alternative medicine? I
            led a content analysis study as part of the Reason4Health
            project. Read the
            paper. Generate
            random news stories!
            How do online media report about vaccination rates? Read the paper
            stemming from my PhD project.
            How should public messaging leverage vaccination rates?
            Is better to emphasize individual or social benefits of
            vaccination? Read the
            preprint and the paper also
            stemming from my PhD project.
            Why should we use stories to counter anti-vaccination
            conspiracy theories? Read our
            paper.
            
            Open Science
            I am a co-founder and manager of REPOPSI, a
            repository established at the LIRA Lab in 2020. REPOPSI
            allows everyone to freely access and share open
            psychological scales, tests, and other research instruments
            translated into Serbian or developed by Serbian scientists.
            I led an EOSC Future and Research Data Alliance funded
            REPOPSI improvement project.
            All of the talks and workshops I gave about REPOPSI are here.
            She has also been engaged in improving the inclusivity
            and accessibility of open and big-team science as part of
            the communities such as the OSCS and ABRIR.
            
            
            Biases in Social Dilemmas
            I co-founded and maintain LIRA‚Äôs open access repository
            of psychological instruments in Serbian (REPOPSI).
            In my spare time, I like to draw, dabble in #SciComm, and
            teach myself R.
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Laziƒá
